titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend educational assistance benefits to dependents of veterans with service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 8/6/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' educational assistance provisions to extend educational assistance benefits to dependents of veterans with a service-connected disability rating of 80 percent or more (currently, 100 percent).
